column2: Hey, good job! Two fobs down, one to go! Ready to solve a Fizzics puzzle/?

Okay, now, your challenge here is to collect 50 points.     

We need to go to the code panel and add more diamonds. Click the Flip button.
Flip to hack and click the add tool to create more diamonds.
Click the + button to add more diamonds.
Great, awesome work.  Let's go to the next level for the next challenge.
Let's keep looking for that fob! According to Saniel, this is our best chance at finding it.
No worries. HMU later if you want to play some more Fizzics.
